languages.text: {n}Губернатор тяжело вздыхает и устало прикрывает ладонью лицо.{/n} "Конечно, известно. Этот техножрец... крайне настойчивый. Я распорядился отправить в священную обитель Адептус Механикус отряд. Пока мои люди не вышли на связь. В нынешних обстоятельствах, увы, я не могу сделать большего. У меня каждый боец на счету здесь, в столице".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор тяжело вздыхает и устало прикрывает ладонью лицо.{/n} "Конечно, известно. Этот техножрец… крайне настойчивый. Я распорядился отправить в священную обитель Адептус Механикус отряд. Пока мои люди не вышли на связь. В нынешних обстоятельствах, увы, я не могу сделать большего и тем более, выделить больше солдат для этой миссии".

languages.text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор тяжело вздыхает и устало прикрывает ладонью лицо.{/n} "Конечно, известно. Этот техножрец... крайне настойчивый. Я распорядился отправить в священную обитель Адептус Механикус отряд. Пока мои люди не вышли на связь. В нынешних обстоятельствах, увы, я не могу сделать большего. У меня каждый боец на счету здесь, в столице".

I have ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy abode of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

{n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem schweren Seufzen legt der Gouverneur erschöpft sein Gesicht in seine Hände.{/n} "Natürlich. Dieser Techpriester ... ist äußerst beharrlich. Ich habe einen Trupp zum heiligen Cenobium des Adeptus Mechanicus geschickt. Sie haben bisher keinen Bericht erstattet. Ich fürchte, dass ich unter den gegebenen Umständen nicht mehr tun kann. Ich kann hier in der Hauptstadt keinen einzigen Soldaten entbehren."
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem schweren Seufzen legt der Gouverneur erschöpft sein Gesicht in seine Hände.{/n} "Natürlich. Dieser Techpriester ... ist äußerst beharrlich. Ich habe einen Trupp zum heiligen Cenobium des Adeptus Mechanicus geschickt. Sie haben bisher keinen Bericht erstattet. Ich fürchte, dass ich unter den gegebenen Umständen nicht mehr tun kann. Ich kann hier in der Hauptstadt keinen einzigen Soldaten entbehren."

languages.text: {n}Avec un grand soupir, le gouverneur se couvre le visage de la main.{/n} « Évidemment. Ce technoprêtre est très... insistant. J'ai donné l'ordre d'envoyer une escouade au Cenobium sacré de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. On est sans nouvelles de ces hommes depuis. Je crains de ne pas pouvoir en faire davantage dans les circonstances actuelles. Je n'ai pas un seul soldat disponible ici, dans la capitale. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un grand soupir, le gouverneur se couvre le visage de la main.{/n} « Évidemment. Ce technoprêtre est très... insistant. J'ai donné l'ordre d'envoyer une escouade au Cenobium sacré de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. On est sans nouvelles de ces hommes depuis. Je crains de ne pas pouvoir en faire davantage dans les circonstances actuelles. Je n'ai pas un seul soldat disponible ici, dans la capitale. »

languages.text: {n}总督沉重地叹了口气，疲倦地用手捂住了脸。{/n}“他当然会这么想了，那位技术神甫……十分固执。我已下令派遣一队人马前往机械修会的神圣修道院，但还没有收到他们的答复。目前的情况下，我能做的恐怕只有这些，首都已经没有多余的士兵了。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督沉重地叹了口气，疲倦地用手捂住了脸。{/n}“他当然会这么想了，那位技术祭司……十分固执。我已下令派遣一队人马前往机械修会的神圣修道院，但还没有收到他们的答复。目前的情况下，我能做的恐怕只有这些，首都已经没有多余的士兵了。”

languages.text: {n}深いため息をついて、総督は疲れたように手で顔を覆った。{/n}「それはもちろん。あの技術司祭は…ひどく強情なのだ。私は、帝国技術局の聖なる連生体に部隊を派遣するよう命じた。まだ連絡はない。残念だが、現状ではこれが精一杯だ。この都市には、ひとりの兵士を送る余裕もない」
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

traits.locale_text: {n}深いため息をついて、総督は疲れたように手で顔を覆った。{/n}「それはもちろん。あの技術司祭は…ひどく強情なのだ。私は、帝国技術局の聖なる連生体に部隊を派遣するよう命じた。まだ連絡はない。残念だが、現状ではこれが精一杯だ。この年には、ひとりの兵士を送る余裕もない」

languages.text: {n}Con un profundo suspiro, el gobernador se tapa la cara con la mano.{/n} «No me cabe duda. Ese tecnosacerdote... es muy insistente. He ordenado el envío de un escuadrón al Cenobio Sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus. Aún no se sabe nada de ellos. Me temo que es todo lo que puedo hacer en las circunstancias actuales. No tengo ni un solo soldado de sobra aquí en la capital».
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un profundo suspiro, el gobernador se tapa la cara con la mano.{/n} «No me cabe duda. Ese tecnosacerdote... es muy insistente. He ordenado el envío de un escuadrón al Cenobio Sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus. Aún no se sabe nada de ellos. Me temo que es todo lo que puedo hacer en las circunstancias actuales. No tengo ni un solo soldado de sobra aquí en la capital».

languages.text: {n}Vali, derin bir iç çektikten sonra eliyle bezgince yüzünü kapatıyor.{/n} "Hiç şaşırmadım. O Tekno Rahip... Çok ısrarcı birisi. Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsal senobiyumuna bir manga sevk edilmesini emrettim. Henüz mangadan haber alamadık. Maalesef şu şartlar altında elimden gelen bu kadar. Başkentte onlara ayırabileceğim tek bir askerim bile yok."
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy sigh, the governor wearily covers his face with his hand.{/n} "Of course he does. That Tech-Priest... is very insistent. I ordered a squad to be dispatched to the holy cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus. They haven't been heard from yet. I'm afraid, this is all I can do under the present circumstances. I don't have a single soldier to spare here in the capital."
